titleStmt.title: A Letter from Scotland written occasionally upon the speech made by a noble peer of this realm by a better Protestant than the author of it (though a servant to His R.H).
titleStmt.author: Roscommon, Wentworth Dillon, Earl of, 1633?-1685.
